thread.title: Keep an Eye on Hong Kong Tycoon’s Prize
thread.title_full: Keep an Eye on Hong Kong Tycoon’s Prize - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: Keep an Eye on Hong Kong Tycoon’s Prize
text:
Hong Kong tycoon Li Ka-shing has had a busy year rearranging the pieces on his chessboard, and he probably isn’t done. To benefit from future moves, investors should consider playing his king piece, CK Hutchison Holdings.
Mr. Li, whose empire sprawls from telecom to ports, last week announced an all-share merger of two of his units, Cheung Kong Infrastructure and Power Assets Holdings. This follows a massive overhaul earlier this...
